pages.text: Any sort of tool being repaired through the use of $(aura) is good and well, until the magical botanist comes in contact with viscious enemies or dangerous heights. At that point, the ability to $(thing)heal oneself$() would certainly be of use.

A $(item)Nature's Mend$() enchanted book, once obtained, can be inserted into an $(item)Ender Chest$()'s enchantment slots to gain the $(item)Nature's Heal$() effect, which will, while $(thing)sneaking$(), top off the user's health slowly while draining $(aura) from an $(aura) container in their inventory.
